name: Dodge the Projectiles 2
description:
(DESCRIPTION WILL BE UPDATED)

INFO:

Dodge the Projectiles is BACK! The 2D Side Scrolling Survival Platformer returns with new features that will interrupt your run of keeping alive by dodging the incoming projectiles, but this time they're coming from all sides! Do you have fast enough reaction times to get the highest score?

GAMEPLAY:
The Gameplay is simple! Simply keep alive by dodging the projectiles, move your Cube up, right, left or down to continue your streak of points. But beworn, do never let your guard down! As you never know where the projectiles will come from!

DEVELOPER(S):

  • Photo Negative Mickey: everything.
